name: Seishin (Lolscrubs)
description:
Story

Because of a dare with your friend, you snuck into a school at night and performed a ritual you read about on the internet. Now you're trapped inside the school building with an evil spirit that has taken possession of your friend. You need to escape the building, but watch out, the closer you get to escaping the more you will anger the spirit!

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • MOUSE - Look
  • E - Interact
  • F - Flashlight
  • SHIFT  - Sprint
  • SPACE - Jump
  • ESC - Pause
